attributes.action: Request the management of the paddling pool on Concord Beach Canvey Island Essex be given to the Town Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To request Castle Point Borough Council who have voted to demolish the paddling pool on Concord Beach Canvey Island hand over the management of the pool to the Town Council. There has been a pool on Concord Beach since the 1930s. It is enjoyed by thousands of children every summer for paddling and crabbing and it offers a safe environment for children from the tides of the River Thames. It also supports an eco-system for crabs and small fish.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Castle Point Borough Council and the Town Council.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
